titles.title: A resolution recognizing the National Hockey League's New Jersey Devils and National Basketball Association's New Jersey Nets for their accomplishments during the 2002-2003 season.
A resolution recognizing the National Hockey League's New Jersey Devils and National Basketball Association's New Jersey Nets for their accomplishments during the 2002-2003 season.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced on June 19, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Congratulates: (1) the New Jersey Devils for winning the National Hockey League's 2003 Stanley Cup; and (2) the New Jersey Nets for their success during the 2002-2003 National Basketball Association season.
